title: Oil watchers say inflation risks will stave off Trump's Canada tariff threat
content: Higher fuel prices are on the cards if President-elect Donald Trump implements tariffs on Canada, said industry experts.
summary: Higher fuel prices are on the cards if President-elect Donald Trump implements tariffs on Canada, said industry experts.

title: Just Eat Takeaway to delist from London Stock Exchange in blow to UK market
content: Dec. 24 will mark the last date of trading of Just Eat Takeaway's shares on the London Stock Exchange.
summary: Dec. 24 will mark the last date of trading of Just Eat Takeaway's shares on the London Stock Exchange.

title: EasyJet rakes in record $4.5 billion from fare add-ons as CEO slams 'unfair' penalty over practice
content: "It's a highly unfair idea that you should not be able to offer products and services targeted for those people who want to use that," Johan Lundgren told CNBC.
summary: "It's a highly unfair idea that you should not be able to offer products and services targeted for those people who want to use that," Johan Lundgren told CNBC.

title: 'Europe's Detroit' built a thriving car industry. Trump tariffs now threaten to unravel its success
content: A small landlocked country in the heart of Europe appears to be uniquely exposed to President-elect Donald Trump's "America First" economic agenda.
summary: A small landlocked country in the heart of Europe appears to be uniquely exposed to President-elect Donald Trump's "America First" economic agenda.

title: France's far right propped up the weak government. It could now bring it crashing down
content: France's government is hanging by a thread as the far-right National Rally party threatens to bring down Prime Minister Michel Barnier's administration.
summary: France's government is hanging by a thread as the far-right National Rally party threatens to bring down Prime Minister Michel Barnier's administration.

title: Reddit targets international users for ad growth, teases bolstered search feature
content: Reddit is ramping up efforts to attract more users outside of the U.S., with countries like India and Brazil in focus, a top company executive told CNBC.
summary: Reddit is ramping up efforts to attract more users outside of the U.S., with countries like India and Brazil in focus, a top company executive told CNBC.

title: This personal finance educator says budgeting is ‘toxic’ — try ‘intuitive’ spending instead
content: One financial educator says there's a dominant culture of budgeting in the U.S. that relies on "restriction, shame and greed."
summary: One financial educator says there's a dominant culture of budgeting in the U.S. that relies on "restriction, shame and greed."

title: Pharma giant Sanofi opens $595 million vaccine facility in Singapore to prepare for potential pandemics
content: It will contribute about 200 skilled jobs to the city-state, and will be fully operational by mid-2026.
summary: It will contribute about 200 skilled jobs to the city-state, and will be fully operational by mid-2026.

title: China's industrial profits fall by 10% in October as deflation worries linger
content: Industrial profits are a key gauge of the financial health of factories, mines and utilities in China.
summary: Industrial profits are a key gauge of the financial health of factories, mines and utilities in China.

title: The shipping industry is wrestling with one of its biggest challenges — seafarer shortages
content: The shipping industry is contending with a shortage of seafarers, and it's fueling a troubling mix of fake resumes, accidents at sea, and higher freight rates.
summary: The shipping industry is contending with a shortage of seafarers, and it's fueling a troubling mix of fake resumes, accidents at sea, and higher freight rates.

title: CNBC Daily Open: The markets are living in Trump’s world for now
content: Trump's moves are affecting the markets — even before he has entered the White House.
summary: Trump's moves are affecting the markets — even before he has entered the White House.

title: OpenAI gets new $1.5 billion investment from SoftBank, allowing employees to sell shares in a tender offer
content: OpenAI on Tuesday introduced a new $1.5 billion tender offer, a continuation of its recent $6.6 billion funding round, led by SoftBank, CNBC has learned.
summary: OpenAI on Tuesday introduced a new $1.5 billion tender offer, a continuation of its recent $6.6 billion funding round, led by SoftBank, CNBC has learned.

title: Samsung Electronics appoints co-CEO in leadership shuffle focused on chip divisions; shares drop
content: Samsung Electronics announced a change in leadership for its memory and foundry chip divisions.
summary: Samsung Electronics announced a change in leadership for its memory and foundry chip divisions.

title: New Zealand expectedly cuts benchmark rate by 50 basis points as economy struggles
content: New Zealand's central bank slashed its benchmark interest rate by 50 basis points to 4.25%, marking a third straight cut to its benchmark interest rate.
summary: New Zealand's central bank slashed its benchmark interest rate by 50 basis points to 4.25%, marking a third straight cut to its benchmark interest rate.

title: Donald Trump selects Kevin Hassett to lead National Economic Council
content: The appointment came as Donald Trump renewed his vow to raise tariffs on imports from China, Mexico and Canada.
summary: The appointment came as Donald Trump renewed his vow to raise tariffs on imports from China, Mexico and Canada.

title: Israel-Hezbollah permanent ceasefire has been accepted, Biden says
content: Israel and Lebanon have agreed to a permanent ceasefire in cross-border hostilities between the Jewish state and Hezbollah militants.
summary: Israel and Lebanon have agreed to a permanent ceasefire in cross-border hostilities between the Jewish state and Hezbollah militants.

title: Trump’s tariff threats signal the start of a wild ride in currency markets
content: Donald Trump's vow to implement additional tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico signals the start of a wild ride in currency markets, strategists say.
summary: Donald Trump's vow to implement additional tariffs on China, Canada and Mexico signals the start of a wild ride in currency markets, strategists say.

title: Workday stock slips on light quarterly forecast
content: Workday called for a 25% adjusted operating margin in the current quarter, below Wall Street's estimate of 25.5%.
summary: Workday called for a 25% adjusted operating margin in the current quarter, below Wall Street's estimate of 25.5%.

title: Dell shares fall on light forecast despite growing AI sales
content: Dell is a top vendor for computers required to develop and deploy artificial intelligence, especially computers based around Nvidia chips.

title: Trump vows an additional 10% tariff on China, 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico
content: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.
summary: The president-elect plans to raise tariffs by an additional 10% on all Chinese goods coming into the U.S., according to a post on his social media platform Truth Social.

title: Jim Cramer defends cryptocurrency support: 'National debt worries are never going to go away'

title: Fed officials see interest rate cuts ahead, but only 'gradually,' meeting minutes show
content: Federal Reserve officials expressed confidence that inflation is easing and the labor market is strong, allowing for further interest rate cuts albeit at a gradual pace.
summary: Federal Reserve officials expressed confidence that inflation is easing and the labor market is strong, allowing for further interest rate cuts albeit at a gradual pace.

title: Bitcoin slides toward $90,000 as price moves back after postelection rally
content: Bitcoin retreated further from the psychological $100,000 milestone as investors booked profits from the token's gains following the presidential election.
summary: Bitcoin retreated further from the psychological $100,000 milestone as investors booked profits from the token's gains following the presidential election.

title: Meet the start-up working to save newborn babies and democratize pregnancy care
content: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.
summary: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.

title: Senate report slams airlines for raking in billions in seat fees
content: The Senate panel is calling airline executives to testify next week about their carriers' fees.

title: Databricks closes in on multibillion funding round at $55 billion valuation to help employees cash out
content: Databricks is raising at least $5 billion in cash — though it could raise as much as $8 billion — pegging its new valuation at $55 billion, sources say.
summary: Databricks is raising at least $5 billion in cash — though it could raise as much as $8 billion — pegging its new valuation at $55 billion, sources say.

title: Huawei launches first phones capable of running its new self-developed operating system
content: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.
summary: Huawei launched the Mate 70, Mate 70 Pro and Mate 70 Pro+ and foldable Mate X6 on Tuesday that can run HarmonyOS NEXT, its self-developed operating system.

title: Banco BPM says UniCredit's 'unusual' $10.5 billion takeover offer does not reflect its profitability
content: UniCredit offered to snap up Banco BPM for roughly $10.5 billion on Monday.

title: Amgen says obesity drug caused up to 20% weight loss after a year, with no plateau
content: The results shed light on how MariTide may measure up to weight loss injections from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly and other experimental treatments.
summary: The results shed light on how MariTide may measure up to weight loss injections from Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly and other experimental treatments.

title: Orange partners with OpenAI, Meta to develop custom African-language AI models
content: Orange is working with OpenAI and Meta to build custom AI models that can understand West African languages not understood by most conversational systems.
summary: Orange is working with OpenAI and Meta to build custom AI models that can understand West African languages not understood by most conversational systems.
